com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

Interface AspectTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericAspectTransformer

    public interface AspectTransformer

    Provides an API for transforming a non-generic aspect definition, i.e. an aspect defined in XML or through component scanning, into a generic AspectDefinition.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/28/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
